title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 99 - New Construction Of Distribution Lines, Service Lines, And Appurtenant Facilities In Certain Visually Significant Resources Outside Residential Subdivisions
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 99

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
